column1: These are the messaging commands. The gooze can send messages to users and channels if the gooze has access to them via a server.

column2: Type "gooze message <user_id or tag> <your message>" to send a message to a user.
Type "gooze remote <channel_id or tag> <your message>" to send a message on a given channel.
Type "gooze say <your message>". The gooze will hide your message by deleting it, and send a your message on the same channel that you ran the command on.
Type "gooze tell <user_id or tag> to <do some action>". For example, you can tell someone to study :) .
